attributes.action: Remove quarantine and test requirements for vaccinated people
attributes.additional_details: The entire point of immunisation by vaccination was for people to be able to return to normal lives and be able to travel without any restrictions.
attributes.background: Removal of the quarantine or PCR test requirements when travelling into UK from Europe including France

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612

Open England to Europe COVID 19 vaccinated without quarantine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591181

Exempt vaccinated people from PCR test requirement when travelling to England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
